definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
jing'erhu, a two-stringed fiddle intermediate in size and pitch between the jinghu 京胡 and erhu 二胡, used to accompany Chinese opera/also called 京胡

sentences.english: The acoustical characteristics of resonator on Erhu are presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文给出二胡共鸣器的特性。

sentences.english: Er-hu virtuosi can play even the most complex violin pieces with two strings.
sentences.chinese: 二胡大师能用两根弦拉最复杂的小提琴曲。

sentences.english: Well, it's an erhu, a kind of fiddle played with a bow.
sentences.chinese: 那叫二胡，是一种用弓演奏的琴。

sentences.english: This paper focuses on the Runqiang Art of Erhu music in Sunan area.
sentences.chinese: 本文重点研究的是苏南二胡曲的润腔艺术。

sentences.english: The cooperation with Tim started her seeking the new prospect of Er-Hu.
sentences.chinese: 和提姆的合作，让她开始寻思二胡的前景。

sentences.english: However, is silk-string Er-Hu really valueless?
sentences.chinese: 不过，丝弦二胡真的已经毫无价值了吗？

sentences.english: In addition, there is a cup-shaped canister and a bow made of horsehair.
sentences.chinese: 另外，二胡有一个杯形状的琴筒和用马尾制成的弓。

sentences.english: The Erhu is mainly a instrument for melody in a sense like voice.
sentences.chinese: 二胡是一种主要发出歌唱性般旋律的乐器。

sentences.english: Another case in point is my learning to play erhu.
He accidentally broke the outer string of grandpa's urheen.
sentences.chinese: 他一不小心把爷爷的二胡的外弦弄断了。

sentences.english: He is also a great Erhu player he also likes to sing Chinese opera too.
sentences.chinese: 爷爷玩得一手很好的二胡和很喜欢唱粤曲。

sentences.english: There is a slim neck about 80 centimeters, on the surface of which two strings are fixed.
sentences.chinese: 二胡的琴杆约80厘米长，用二个弦在其表面固定。

sentences.english: Erhu master George Gao's ensemble dress rehearsal of the erhu classic Horse Racing.
sentences.chinese: 二胡演奏家高韶青和他的乐队彩排赛马。

sentences.english: He creates the reorganization urheen music to reach 30 heads.
sentences.chinese: 他创作改编二胡乐曲达30余首。

sentences.english: Chapter One : A Preliminary Study on Erhu Music after the Establishment of New China.
sentences.chinese: 第一章建国以来二胡音乐的初步研究。

sentences.english: Erhu now has become one of the most popular instruments in China.
sentences.chinese: 二胡现在已成为中国最流行的乐器之一。

definition: jinghu, a smaller, higher-pitched erhu 二胡 (two-stringed fiddle) used to accompany Chinese opera/also called 京二胡
a bowed stringed instrument with a thin wooden soundboard
huqin/family of Chinese two-stringed fiddles, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and bamboo bow with horsehair bowstring
zither or guzheng/large zither with 13 to 25 strings, developed from guqin 古琴[gu3 qin2] during Tang and Song times
zhongruan or alto lute, like pipa 琵琶 but bigger and lower range
hulusi, aka cucurbit flute (a kind of free reed wind instrument)
sanxian, large family of 3-stringed plucked musical instruments, with snakeskin covered wooden soundbox and long neck, used in folk music, opera and Chinese orchestra
